inclusion.criterion: Must sign informed consent, witnessed, and dated prior to entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The participant has breast biopsy consistent with Ductal Carcinoma in situ (DCIS)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performance Status: ECOG 0-1 unless mobility is limited from chronic physical handicap
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No clinical evidence of other malignancies (except Basal Cell carcinoma)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Complete blood count, differential and platelet count must be WNL or verified by the study chair to be related to conditions not interfering with normal health status
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hepatic and renal function (these must be WNL or verified by study chair to be related to conditions not interfering with normal health status)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Medically and Psychologically able to comply with all study requirements
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known invasive breast cancer of any type
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior malignancy of any type that occurred less than 5 years previously, except for basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin or carcinoma in situ of the cervix
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Existing non-malignant disease that would preclude the administration of pasireotide
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy: All subjects will have a beta-hCG serum pregnancy test to rule out pregnancy, a history will also be taken to make certain that recent sexual exposure does not put them at risk for pregnancy. If so a second serum pregnancy test will be done. Volunteers will be asked to use barrier contraception during study.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Tamoxifen or other preventive measures within 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious Psychiatric condition or addictive disorder
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diabetes or elevated fasting blood sugar either by history or by HgbA1c greater than 6.5% or fasting serum glucose greater than 100mg/dL on screening labs. If fasting serum glucose is greater than 100mg/dL on screening labs, this test will be repeated to confirm the results
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to inject medication or test for finger stick glucose
exclusion.label: unknown
